results.title: Simvastatin Improves Behavioral Disorders and Hippocampal Inflammatory Reaction by NMDA-Mediated Anti-inflammatory Function in MPTP-Treated Mice.
results.text_hl: Our results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can improve the cognitive function, @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@, and @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ of @DISEASE_Parkinson_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D010300 @@@PD@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with @CHEMICAL_1_Methyl_4_phenyl_1_2_3_6_tetrahydropyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015632 @@@MPTP@@@ injury.

results.title: High dose simvastatin and rosuvastatin impair cognitive abilities of healthy rats via decreasing hippocampal neurotrophins and irisin.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Locomotion and learning and memory functions were lower, but @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@ levels were higher in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ groups than in the control group (P < 0.05).

results.title: Gene expression profiling reveals a role of immune system and inflammation in innate and stress-induced anxiety-like behavior
results.text_hl: We discovered several drugs that induced opposite gene expression patterns to innate (@CHEMICAL_medrysone @CHEMICAL_MESH:C100283 @@@medrysone@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) or stress-induced (@CHEMICAL_Captopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002216 @@@captopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Sulpiride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013469 @@@sulpiride@@@) @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@-like behavior.

results.title: [Psychiatric disorders with use of simvastatin].
results.text_hl: Three @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ are described with serious @DISEASE_Mental_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@psychiatric complications@@@ related to use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. The @DISEASE_Mental_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@psychiatric symptoms@@@ concerned were mainly @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@ and suicidal tendencies but also @DISEASE_Psychotic_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D011618 @@@psychotic symptoms@@@.

results.title: The anxiolytic effects of atorvastatin and simvastatin on dietary-induced increase in homocysteine levels in rats.
results.text_hl: Simultaneous administration of statins showed beneficial effects by means of both decreased parameters of oxidative stress and attenuation of @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@. The results obtained with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ were more convincible compared to @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@.

results.text_hl: In the HFD group, enhanced @<m>DISEASE_Anxiety</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@ and @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@, and reduced cognitive performances of animals were reversed by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ treatment.
